entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio 2019 - account settings not working #55792
    untriaged
  • Inheritance margin navigation sometimes doesn't work #55791
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Inheritance margin: Show tooltip of fully qualified name #55790
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pattern Matching suggestion moves variable definition into stricter scope #55782
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Closed

  • BUG: closure is created for (this) when nameof() is referencing a member #53591
    Bug, Area-Compilers, Resolution-Fixed, Developer Community, IDE-IntelliSense, 17.0.P4

Updated

  • Garbage base clause causes compiler crash #55797
    Bug, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable nullable reference types in Roslyn #39166
    Area-Infrastructure, Story, Concept-Null Annotations
  • Language services crashed when editing .NET Runtime project #55794
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Visual Studio 2022 Changes Refactoring Order #55636
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • exception in IntroduceParameterService #54198
    Bug, help wanted, Area-IDE, Backlog
  • IDE0130 message "Namespace 'Foo' does not match folder structure, expected 'Foo'" #55550
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EditorConfig UI: Select language for Analyzers #53834
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • Generating Instance Registrations For Classes Holding Async Methods #55500
    Area-Compilers, Need More Info, New Feature - Source Generators, fabric-bot-test, 17.0
  • Fix Hot Reload active statement remapping #52100
    Interactive-EnC, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • [API Proposal]: In-object fixed size arrays in safe context #55772
    Area-Language Design, untriaged

PullRequests

Created

  • Use lambda expression and method group signature in type inference #55786
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55785
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Inline Hints: Option to suppress hints where the parameter name and argument name are the same #55781
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55784
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55789
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/source-build #55788
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55787
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55783
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [LSP] Add semantic tokens caching case #55692
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55777
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Address Interpolated Strings test plan #55701
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55780
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55779
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Region analysis of nameof #55724
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55778
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55776
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/source-build #55796
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #55436
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Convert tests to new test framework #55795
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of raw string literals #54789
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Trigger refactoring if the cursor is put on modifier or type of field #55523
    Area-IDE
  • Run dotnet-format on Roslyn #55679
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0 #55740
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
